text: Great Barrington is a town in Berkshire County, Massachusetts, United States. The population was 7,172 at the 2020 census. It is the birthplace of W. E. B. Du Bois. In 2012, Smithsonian magazine ranked Great Barrington #1 in its list of "The 20 Best Small Towns in America". ==References== Category:Towns in Massachusetts Category:Berkshire County, Massachusetts
title: Great Barrington, Massachusetts
